attributes.title: Worst App Ever
attributes.review: This is the worst app ever created it has such bad quality every time i open the app i see an orange pop up and it gets really annoying dont download this app ever it will wate your time and energy

attributes.title: a scam
attributes.review: this app made my phone lag so bad it was always glitching when i was on the app and i ordered stuff from this app and my stuff never came it’s been over 4 months and customer service is NO HELP AT ALL! DO NOT INSTALL AT ALL!!!

attributes.title: Worst app ever
attributes.review: As soon as I opened the app my phone exploded!! 😡I now have 3rd degree burns on my hands so if you value your life please don’t download this app!!😖 I am writing this review on my Nintendo switch so I could warn y’all about how dangerous this app is ✨🧚‍♀️

attributes.title: Disappointed
attributes.review: This app took 2 days to download and was so glitchy I honestly expected better from the trump administration. It was also very hard to understand what to do!

attributes.title: I almost died!!!!!
attributes.review: As soon as I downloaded this app, orange juice came out of no where and flooded my apartment!!! I couldn’t get out in time!!!!!!! I am now writing from my grave to tell you to never download this app. You will get syphilis and die!!!!

attributes.title: Hjghsshah
attributes.review: This app took me weeks to download and now going super slow and asking me to many personal questions. As a citizen I strongly agree that trump doesn’t serve another 4 years this is the end for him.

attributes.title: App is crashing needs an ASAP makeover
attributes.review: I was so happy😅 to download this app because I wanted to learn about our great leader and support this orange🍊 president🤮 but then it took forever to download even though I have perfectly 👌🏻good WiFi.

attributes.title: Worst app ever😘
attributes.review: I am outraged this app took WEEKS to download and after that it started spamming my phone with trump signs I COULDNT EVEN USE IT then snakes started showing up at my house wrapped in vinyl that said trump 2020 they were extremely venomous I can’t believe it

attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review: This app is unbelievably slow it has terrible quality and words can’t describe how unsatisfied I am with this app so I believe actions can , I am giving this app a 1 star rating due to it’s terrible service

attributes.title: WASTE OF TIME!!
attributes.review: AS SOON AS I OPENED THE APP MY ENTIRE PHONE CRASHED!! After I needed to get a new phone! I went to the Apple store and the phone I wanted was $1,000! OUTRAGEOUS. I was livid. I’ve talked to others and they said the same has happened to them. So before you get the app, read reviews!! 🤬
